data.text: At #WEF19 in Davos, @antonioguterres discussed disabilities & inclusion issues with Paralympic Gold medalist @Susie_Rodgers. Her story: https://t.co/nP5gD9t5yo via @WEF https://t.co/FyNxOLstbS

With support from @UNICEFSudan & @UNMISSMedia 68 children were released from armed groups in South Sudan. This is the 4th group of children to be set free since last year's peace deal. https://t.co/hG5vYn4X1Y https://t.co/RuGPIyH5xM

This little boy lives in Wau Shilluk, South Sudan, where there’s no hospital, no school & no clean water. Conflict has destroyed his home town.

@UNICEF aims to assist 41 million children like him in 2019: https://t.co/2ro9BZFP0v https://t.co/TSv5n718Oo

Gender parity is a critical component of the UN reform currently underway - and will help create a more effective & efficient UN that delivers for people & planet: https://t.co/iLhk1paaSk https://t.co/NIpDEttgDK
The International Year of #IndigenousLanguages was officially launched at UNHQ in NYC today. #WeAreIndigenous! https://t.co/UsuA4IYlRQ https://t.co/TUsdMGtfTW
To achieve a peaceful & sustainable future, the world must be free of nuclear weapons. Info on the UN and disarmament here: https://t.co/HwXwt561Vi #GlobalGoals https://t.co/AvSHAyj3qf

Lifesaving work is being done for Venezuelans in Colombia.

But many women, children and men remain in urgent need of support. 

Here's how you can help @Refugees protect the most vulnerable: https://t.co/h0Awq0KsY6 https://t.co/Xwp2WRMRI1
It's Interfaith Harmony Week! See how @UNAOC promotes mutual respect among people all year long: https://t.co/ir7FyG5zs8 #GlobalGoals

In Syria’s Al Hol camp, @WHOSyria is providing life-saving treatment to children & families who have fled violence — but appeals for unhindered access to reach those in urgent need. https://t.co/UYlWbfpj4N https://t.co/XlXr38CxBk
Friday: Equatorial Guinea takes on rotating presidency of the Security Council for the month of February. https://t.co/EX1AbBFhhl https://t.co/BE2LZFzkfZ

US$162 needed to help 2.3 million most vulnerable women, children and men in eastern Ukraine. This is how @UNOCHA plans to support them: https://t.co/omImOAeoLa #InvestInHumanity https://t.co/5gAhghtzit

Artificial intelligence-based inventions are booming. New @WIPO Technology Trends report has latest data on key players, fastest-growing areas, geographical & market trends: https://t.co/hIdTUDE3Qx https://t.co/OkycqoJcH1

UNHCR has carried out first evacuation flight from Libya in 2019, bringing 130 refugees from detention centers in Tripoli to safety in Niger: https://t.co/Ix4eklsUFO via @Refugees https://t.co/kMRdhpgNIt

As part of its support to communities most affected by cholera, @UNHaiti inaugurated new marketplace in city of Mirebalais with improved hygiene & sanitation conditions. https://t.co/3a9tGJBK7I https://t.co/5oRVzQlS3g

Canadian aircraft support @UNPeacekeeping operations in Mali by enhancing transport & logistics capabilities, as well as medical evacuations. More on @UN_MINUSMA's work: https://t.co/XucMYFZTfY #ServingForPeace https://t.co/oQ4HQZUyOZ

How to apply for UN jobs?

1) Search for job openings on @UN_Careers: https://t.co/5KcULnQla9 
2) Register, prepare & submit application: https://t.co/p3sE0HkHH3 

Good luck! https://t.co/q2tYPUCYnE

Democratic Republic of Congo: @MONUSCO confirms discovery of mass graves of 500+ civilians and says the extremely violent attacks were carried out in organized and planned manner: https://t.co/xJMUN0zDQP
As deaths due to opioid abuse skyrocket, take a 🎧 to @UNODC panelists @david_sheff & @vickycornell share their thoughts on loss & how to end the crisis. https://t.co/oqsLoEfo5X

1.1M+ people in Libya need humanitarian assistance. @UNOCHA is helping provide life-saving support: https://t.co/YlNeP6aEHP

https://t.co/yqepxJ1E5w

An estimated 2,275 people died or went missing in the Mediterranean Sea in 2018 - an average of 6 deaths a day, says new #DesperateJourneys @Refugees report on world's deadliest sea crossing. https://t.co/UgyzzAprc4

Nothing can stop health workers in Pakistan from delivering vaccines to #EndPolio. The countrywide anti-polio drive will protect more than 39 million children against the crippling virus: https://t.co/eH7VtQOT9l via @WHOPakistan #GlobalGoals https://t.co/GbDwspQ2KM
To celebrate 150 years of the periodic table, test your knowledge of chemical elements here: https://t.co/WzvlwGEfha https://t.co/VIHNeK6jnj
.@UNRWA appeals for $1.2 billion in humanitarian funds to provide assistance & protection for Palestine Refugees across the Middle East: https://t.co/R4xSnlCpyX https://t.co/TGHk8KrT6i

Women in Democratic Republic of the Congo take lead in fight against latest Ebola outbreak, informing their communities about the virus & how to stop its spread: https://t.co/jEPaHqEsmb via @WHO https://t.co/3aWPq0UOSs

Venezuela: More than 40 people believed to have been killed, with 850+ detained while protesting, incl 77 children, says @UNHumanRights. https://t.co/irB8VjcYBr

 https://t.co/tVVptTxkci
Millions of #ChildrenUnderAttack need urgent protection, warns @UNICEF in new humanitarian appeal: https://t.co/vBAYVAVZZo https://t.co/5wnwNp0ZzJ
2019 is the Int'l Year of the Periodic Table. @UNESCO explains how chemistry contributes to the #GlobalGoals: https://t.co/ZRsQjNd5PD https://t.co/mDBBfiEoyz
#TourTuesday: @VisitUN Kids’ Tours are a fun way for young visitors to explore the UN’s work through interactive games, quizzes & more. Details here: https://t.co/S5ptESSN0i https://t.co/kz1Q4lO5fI
See how we commemorated #HolocaustRemembrance Day at UNHQ in NYC in our latest @instagram story: https://t.co/UH4OQC7zhU https://t.co/OEAjJMqSfD

In @UNICEF-supported child care centres in the Democratic Republic of the Congo, Ebola survivors who are immune to the disease are caring for babies whose parents are in isolation: https://t.co/Ws4qqIHAoZ https://t.co/DaBZUAU7HY

If you missed last week's @Facebook Live with @antonioguterres, see what the Secretary-General had to say about #ClimateAction, gender equality & more here: https://t.co/cOn1rgs3zt https://t.co/XaxXhp2ZMs

Indigenous leaders took the stage @UNESCO in Paris on Monday to launch the Int'l Year of #IndigenousLanguages, which are threatened by extinction: https://t.co/UsuA4IYlRQ #WeAreIndigenous https://t.co/aKMdWqZ0QF

"Our urgent challenge today is to heed the lessons of history and the Holocaust." 
-- @antonioguterres joined Holocaust survivors at Monday's #HolocaustRemebrance event, calling for a stand against hate & hate speech: https://t.co/7xL2knTHg8 https://t.co/5SY0N8idbZ

"Not only is anti-Semitism still strong – it is getting worse. We must rise up against rising anti-Semitism." -- @antonioguterres at Monday's #HolocaustRemembrance event: https://t.co/IqSfqbCRPk https://t.co/PyZ3quZcIS

Given current humanitarian & political challenges, @Refugees + @UNMigration urge countries in Latin America to remain faithful to their tradition of solidarity regarding Venezuelan refugees & migrants:  https://t.co/0gZFeCOYqO https://t.co/WefzzKHrOG

Starting now: @antonioguterres joins Holocaust survivors for #HolocaustRemembrance ceremony in #UNGA.
https://t.co/Ff4ZStIsLz

You want to help save the planet but don’t know how? https://t.co/zTkumwytsA is the tool to help people around the 🌍 take #ClimateAction every day. https://t.co/tgquVtTkmy

New @UNESCO report: 1 in 3 children bullied over last month. Physical bullying is still most common, but online bullying also on the rise: https://t.co/F7qiUwEeij https://t.co/2BL66UovzJ
See how women are #ServingForPeace with @UNPeacekeeping around the world: https://t.co/KStGbcKZoh https://t.co/W7gyWiQ8Ji
From environmental protection to improved energy access - blockchain could have a big impact when it comes to achieving the #GlobalGoals. Learn how from @UNDP: https://t.co/xAmKwiSrV0

"Don't ever hate each other."

Holocaust survivors share their stories on #HolocaustRemembrance Day and every day, so that we can learn from the past to prevent future genocides: https://t.co/QWcDT9gEBi via @USCShoahFdn #StrongerThanHate https://t.co/j5PlaYJc1I

If we do everything we can to reduce our own carbon footprint, we are contributing to solve the most dramatic problem that humankind is facing. -- @antonioguterres urges everyone to take #ClimateAction.  https://t.co/guYJ5NzLnV https://t.co/7NC1jN2cjS

Seasonal influenza kills up to 650,000 people every year.

Get info from @WHO on how to prevent the flu, recognize the symptoms - and what to do when you have it: https://t.co/wMWaycfAoh #GlobalGoals https://t.co/17j1Tyk5ts

Today we honour the memory of the six million Jews who perished in the Holocaust...

Now more than ever, let us unite in the fight for universal values & build a world of equality for all.
-@antonioguterres on #HolocaustRemembrance Day: https://t.co/a37Co86mXb https://t.co/Qx075bmyzd
The theme of Sunday's #HolocaustRemembrance Day is "Demand and Defend Your Human Rights”. Follow @UNHOP & see for details: https://t.co/bLqlPhkneM https://t.co/1MooKGrOps

"We will always be at the forefront of the fight against anti-Semitism and hatred."

—@antonioguterres joined Rabbi Arthur Schneier and Holocaust survivors at Saturday's #HolocaustRemembrance ceremony at Park East Synagogue, NYC. https://t.co/pmUlaaZXOU https://t.co/bTnwHipHse
Meet Saidul - a Rohingya refugee & aspiring entrepreneur in the largest refugee camp in the world. He's trying to support his family of 14 while earning less than $1 per week. https://t.co/moFeKiGVwW

Venezuela: “We must try to help bring about a political solution that will allow the country’s citizens to enjoy peace, prosperity & all their human rights." -@UNDPPA chief Rosemary DiCarlo tells Security Council. https://t.co/0iApRRvNir

We are totally committed to achieving gender parity -- @antonioguterres on efforts to reach 50/50 men & women in the UN by 2028. 

See his full #WEF19 @Facebook Live here: https://t.co/guYJ5NzLnV https://t.co/T5i2cT1NvM
What was once an ISIS bomb factory in Mosul is now a dorm for young Iraqi women determined to rebuild their city, and their country -- with support from @UNDP. https://t.co/7NsTWrT4eO

At #WEF19 in Davos, @antonioguterres thanked UAE for planning to host preparatory meeting for his #ClimateAction Summit in September, to increase ambition to limit climate change. https://t.co/noPb54VkrS https://t.co/8JLlisP074

Indigenous languages are important for development, peace building, reconciliation & more. Details about the International Year of Indigenous Languages 2019 ➡️ https://t.co/Jr2KZXWSoh #WeAreIndigenous https://t.co/YktwgvKNJF

“Addressing the security implications of climate change is a collective problem, which requires a collective response.” -- @UNDPPA chief Rosemary DiCarlo tells Security Council. https://t.co/ZGRBR5PfHR #ClimateAction https://t.co/zBF8QD0QyT

Work is good for mental well-being -- but a negative working environment can lead to problems.

Here are some way to promote#MentalHealth at work: 

✅Get moving
✅Recognize signs of stress 
✅Listen 
✅Offer support 
✅Talk 
✅Ask for help 

https://t.co/Gw0UeUp3cq
Drastic increase in humanitarian needs across Cameroon, with 4.3 million conflict-affected people - mostly women & children - in need of life-saving assistance. https://t.co/eEWnEqpLjS

Nearly 62 million people were impacted by extreme weather events in 2018. Over 10,000 people lost their lives - mostly due to earthquakes & tsunamis. More from @unisdr ➡️ https://t.co/353lDBVRDc #ResilienceForAll https://t.co/UAZ9RIpGwr

Take #ClimateAction by eating more sustainably:

- Reduce your meat consumption 🥩 
- Switch to plant-based diets 🥕 
- Don't waste food 🗑 

More tips from @UNEnvironment ➡️ https://t.co/nvx9GvvHKf https://t.co/Xt7pQZn5Vj
Have a look at our latest @instagram story to find out what @antonioguterres, @elliegoulding and others are doing at @WEF in Davos ➡️ https://t.co/UH4OQBPYqm https://t.co/57c9ATh856
"We need to work together. There is no way we can do isolated responses to the problems we face. They are all interlinked." @antonioguterres at #WEF19 in Davos. ⬇️ https://t.co/QW7gMLVYUj
On Thursday's first-ever #EducationDay, join @UNESCO in calling for quality education for everyone. https://t.co/JXZnZsCEyJ #GlobalGoals https://t.co/QsqS5nL65V

We are worried about the suffering of Venezuelan people ... We hope that dialogue can be possible & that we avoid an escalation that could lead to the kind of conflict that would be a total disaster for Venezuela.  
-- @antonioguterres at #WEF19 in Davos: https://t.co/guYJ5NRmMv https://t.co/qkvMZ6uxcw

.@theflipflopi - a sailboat made of 10 tonnes of recycled plastic, including 30,000 recycled flip flops  - starts its #CleanSeas expedition from Kenya to Tanzania: https://t.co/qtmB8G30UG via @UNEnvironment #ClimateAction https://t.co/BYinQsSTe7

We need education to 
- reduce inequalities &  improve health
- achieve gender equality & eliminate child marriage
- protect our planet’s resources
- fight hate speech, xenophobia & intolerance.

-- @antonioguterres on Thursday's #EducationDay. https://t.co/prxPp2A8Kx https://t.co/NEMF3oIB9n

Education is a human right and 🔑 to development & peace, yet 262 million children & youth are not in school. More on Thursday's 1st-ever #EducationDay from @UNESCO ➡️
https://t.co/JXZnZsUfXj https://t.co/j05GcuxJgG
📷: Major General Cheryl Pearce of Australia is the Force Commander of @UN_CYPRUS. More about women #ServingForPeace with @UNPeacekeeping here: https://t.co/KStGbctowJ https://t.co/1vASWIAW86

The UN:
• Feeds 80M people
• Supplies vaccines for children
• Protects people forced to flee
• Tackles climate change
• Keeps peace 
• Fights poverty
• Promotes human rights

Marine protected areas are essential to: 
➡️ prevent over-fishing 🎣

➡️ build resilience to climate change 🏝

The Manhattan skyline looking south at sunset from UNHQ on a cold January evening. While the UN is based in NYC, we work around the globe to create a better world for all. https://t.co/3fZT1DqD84 #GlobalGoals https://t.co/cTvjC4eqhJ

The world’s #IndigenousLanguages are under threat of disappearing. Their survival plays a vital role in preserving cultural traditions and achieving the #GlobalGoals: https://t.co/Jr2KZYetMR  #WeAreIndigenous https://t.co/2DvJzHdCKY

Global economy expected to grow, but inequalities, debt & climate change threaten to derail progress unless world comes together to tackle these issues now. Details in new @UNDESA #WESP2019 report: https://t.co/ODBKe9wWrG https://t.co/wVwTEYRf7O

What has the UN ever done for YOU?

Maybe more than you think: from eradicating smallpox to healing the ozone layer to setting global standards on aviation, medicine & more. @VisitUN tour guides explain. https://t.co/MGT7G5Mqxj https://t.co/wKuPRtkVYU
